item.title: GSoC 2018 - Batteries Included!
item.description:
Much time has passed and much code has been written since my last update. Adaptive Streaming (a better name TBD) for Ardupilot is nearly complete and brings a whole slew of features useful for streaming video from cameras on robots to laptops, phones, and tablets:

  • Automatic quality selection based on …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: GSoC 2018 - New Beginnings
item.description: I'm really excited to say that I'll be working with Ardupilot for the better part of the next two months! Although this is the second time I'm making a foray into Open Source Development, the project at hand this time is quite different from what I had worked on in …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: GSoC Report - Wrapping up GSoC 2016
item.description:
That’s it. After a combined total of 217 git commits, 6,202 lines of code added, and 4,167 lines of code deleted, GSoC 2016 is finally over.

These twelve weeks of programming have been a very enriching experience for me and making this project has taught me a …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: GSoC Update: Tinkering with KIO
item.description:
I'm a lot closer to finishing the project now. Thanks to some great support from my GSoC mentor, my project has turned out better than what I had written about in my proposal! Working together, we've made a lot of changes to the project.

For starters, we've changed the name …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: GSoC Update 1: The Beginning
item.description:
I have officially started my GSoC project under the mentorship of Boudhayan Gupta and Pinak Ahuja.

The project idea's implementation has undergone some changes from what I proposed. While the essence of the project is the same, it will now no longer be dependent on Baloo and xattr. Instead, it …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: It has happened - GSoC 2016 Selection!
item.description:
Wow!

I have been selected for the Google Summer of Code!

For the better part of the summer vacation, I will now be committing myself to write code for KDE to implement my project idea of implementing a virtual folder in Dolphin to make it easier to select files.

As …
item.dc:creator: Arnav Dhamija

item.title: GSoC 2016 Project Survey, help me make Dolphin a better File Manager!
item.description:
Hey everyone!

I am a first year computer science undergraduate from BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus. I am looking forward to working for KDE for the GSoC.

My project idea is based on solving a problem all file managers have had for years - the lack of an easy to use file …
